data.title: The Hanover Insurance Group
data.meta_description: Since 1852, The Hanover Insurance Group has been providing world class auto, home, and business insurance services to our customers. We are big enough to get things done and local enough to care.
data.text:
See everything we insure

Experience a higher level of coverage, service and convenience.

Difference-making expertise for businesses in a wide range of industries.

Learn what makes us stand out

We're proud to be recognized for being a company that delivers meaningful value for our customers, agents, employees and communities.

Hear from customers like you

Everyone we spoke to, the very first question was, are you OK? And that's a good place to start.‚Äù

A Hanover Prestige customer

Featured resources

Get safety and insurance articles, videos, infographics and more to help keep your family, business and property safe, and guide you through the insurance buying process.

Legal Notice

Counterfeit check notice - It has come to our attention that a third party, (or parties), is issuing counterfeit Hanover checks to individuals as part of a scam.
